subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution. Northeastern Argentina , southern Brazil , Paraguay , and Bolivia . We regard the label legend “ Chubut ” for
H. doellojuradoi
( Holotype ♀ ) as erroneous because Chubut is a southern Patagonian province of Argentina and
Horvathinia
is a subtropical taxon.
